subject: docs(guide): fix output guide consistency and add missing guidance
body:
Fix duplicate arcs in the Acme Corp example where wiki-links to
Sequoia Capital and Y Combinator created redundant "links to" arcs
alongside the explicit "funded by" connections: entries. Add a new
tip warning against wiki-linking targets that already have a
connections: block.

Align tags/labels terminology across all three documentation
surfaces (output guide, markdown-import-format, conventions modal)
so they consistently use "tags:" as the primary user-facing term
with a note that "labels:" also works.

Remove viewData from the JSON conventions required fields list
since the parser defaults it to {} when missing.

Add output size guidance (under 200 items per import) and body
content formatting guidance (1-3 paragraphs, bullet points for
structured facts).

Tags: docs, guide, conventions, import, consistency
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
